SELECT COUNT(T1.GC_ID) FROM PIS_GeneralCustomer T1 WHERE T1.GC_IsValid = 1
T1.GC_ID!=#WHERE_GC_ID#
T1.GC_Name=#WHERE_GC_Name#
T1.GC_PhoneNo=#WHERE_GC_PhoneNo#

SELECT T2.GC_Name FROM SD_SalesOrder T1 INNER JOIN PIS_GeneralCustomer T2 ON T2.GC_ID=T1.SO_CustomerID WHERE T1.SO_IsValid = 1 AND T1.SO_CustomerID IS NOT NULL AND T1.SO_CustomerID != '' AND #WHERE_GC_ID# LIKE '%;' + T1.SO_CustomerID + ';%' UNION SELECT T2.GC_Name FROM EWM_Wallet T1 INNER JOIN PIS_GeneralCustomer T2 ON T2.GC_ID=T1.Wal_CustomerID WHERE T1.Wal_IsValid = 1 AND T1.Wal_CustomerID IS NOT NULL AND T1.Wal_CustomerID != '' AND #WHERE_GC_ID# LIKE '%;' + T1.Wal_CustomerID + ';%'
